1. The VPS is physically located in mainland China, behind the Great Firewall of China (GFW), so the VPS cannot visit the blocked website such as Facebook, Twitter and maybe Google.

3. Manually Set up, which may take up to 24 hours.
4. No Refund. If you want to have a trial, contact us.
5. Anything that is illegal cannot be hosted. For example: Politics, Porn, Hacking, Online Proxy, Lottery Ticket, Gambling, Violence...
6. 80 port is blocked unless you have an ICP license. (http://www.starrydns.net/china-icp-license-faq)
